name: Hoverland
description:
WIP. Prototype revived for Project Revival Jam 2 (Project Revival Jam 2 - itch.io). Atm use your mouse to look around and left click to boost forward. For more challenging fun use only a little boost and focus on sliding downhill. to maintain speed.

I am working on ironing out the physics, basic settings, basic start/finish racing track gameplay, sculpted tracks, art, etc, etc, etc...

Controls

  • mouse aims both steering and camera
  • left mouse button accelerates
  • [O] options screen
  • [P] pause game
  • [B] back level
  • [N] next level
